EmailTemplate.name: Initiate QBR
EmailTemplate.subject: Initiate QBR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
This is to keep you posted that Implementation for {!Opportunity.Name} has been completed. Please initiate first QBR !!
In case of any questions, please let us know.
Thanks & Regards,
CorpAdmin - AutoRABIT
Sreekanth.u@autorabit.com
